GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Returns a type of the ApiRange class.

GetRow.name: GetRow
GetRow.description: Returns a row number for the selected cell.

GetCol.name: GetCol
GetCol.description: Returns a column number for the selected cell.

GetRows.name: GetRows
GetRows.description: Returns a Range object that represents the rows in the specified range. If the specified row is outside the Range object, a new Range will be returned that represents the cells between the columns of the original range in the specified row.

params.name: nRow
params.description: The row number (starts counting from 1, the 0 value returns an error).

GetCols.name: GetCols
GetCols.description: Returns a Range object that represents the columns in the specified range.

params.name: nCol
params.description: The column number. *

End.name: End
End.description: Returns a Range object that represents the end in the specified direction in the specified range.

params.name: direction
params.description: The direction of end in the specified range. *

GetCells.name: GetCells
GetCells.description: Returns a Range object that represents all the cells in the specified range or a specified cell.

params.name: row
params.description: The row number or the cell number (if only row is defined).

params.name: col
params.description: The column number.

params.name: nRow
params.description: The row number.

params.name: nCol
params.description: The column number.

params.name: RowAbs
params.description: Defines if the link to the row is absolute or not.

params.name: ColAbs
params.description: Defines if the link to the column is absolute or not.

params.name: RefStyle
params.description: The reference style.

params.name: External
params.description: Defines if the range is in the current file or not.

params.name: RelativeTo
params.description: The range which the current range is relative to.

GetValue.name: GetValue
GetValue.description: Returns a value of the specified range.

SetValue.name: SetValue
SetValue.description: Sets a value to the current cell or cell range.

params.name: data
params.description: The general value for the cell or cell range.

GetFormula.name: GetFormula
GetFormula.description: Returns a formula of the specified range.

GetValue2.name: GetValue2
GetValue2.description: Returns the Value2 property (value without format) of the specified range.

GetText.name: GetText
GetText.description: Returns the text of the specified range.

SetFontColor.name: SetFontColor
SetFontColor.description: Sets the text color to the current cell range with the previously created color object.

params.name: oColor
params.description: The color object which specifies the color to be set to the text in the cell / cell range.

GetHidden.name: GetHidden
GetHidden.description: Returns the value hiding property. The specified range must span an entire column or row.

SetHidden.name: SetHidden
SetHidden.description: Sets the value hiding property. The specified range must span an entire column or row.

params.name: isHidden
params.description: Specifies if the values in the current range are hidden or not.

SetColumnWidth.name: SetColumnWidth
SetColumnWidth.description: Sets the width of all the columns in the current range. One unit of column width is equal to the width of one character in the Normal style. For proportional fonts, the width of the character 0 (zero) is used.

params.name: nWidth
params.description: The width of the column divided by 7 pixels.

params.name: nHeight
params.description: The row height in the current range measured in points.

SetFontSize.name: SetFontSize
SetFontSize.description: Sets the font size to the characters of the current cell range.

params.name: nSize
params.description: The font size value measured in points.

SetFontName.name: SetFontName
SetFontName.description: Sets the specified font family as the font name for the current cell range.

params.name: sName
params.description: The font family name used for the current cell range.

SetAlignVertical.name: SetAlignVertical
SetAlignVertical.description: Sets the vertical alignment of the text in the current cell range.

params.name: sAligment
params.description: The vertical alignment that will be applied to the cell contents.

SetAlignHorizontal.name: SetAlignHorizontal
SetAlignHorizontal.description: Sets the horizontal alignment of the text in the current cell range.

params.name: sAlignment
params.description: The horizontal alignment that will be applied to the cell contents.

SetBold.name: SetBold
SetBold.description: Sets the bold property to the text characters in the current cell or cell range.

params.name: isBold
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the current cell / cell range are displayed bold.

SetItalic.name: SetItalic
SetItalic.description: Sets the italic property to the text characters in the current cell or cell range.

params.name: isItalic
params.description: Specifies that the contents of the current cell / cell range are displayed italicized.

SetUnderline.name: SetUnderline
SetUnderline.description: Specifies that the contents of the current cell / cell range are displayed along with a line appearing directly below the character.

params.name: undelineType
params.description:
Specifies the type of the line displayed under the characters. The following values are available:

  • "none" - for no underlining;
  • "single" - for a single line underlining the cell contents;
  • "singleAccounting" - for a single line underlining the cell contents but not protruding beyond the cell borders;
  • "double" - for a double line underlining the cell contents;
  • "doubleAccounting" - for a double line underlining the cell contents but not protruding beyond the cell borders.

SetStrikeout.name: SetStrikeout
SetStrikeout.description: Specifies that the contents of the cell / cell range are displayed with a single horizontal line through the center of the contents.

params.name: isStrikeout
params.description: Specifies if the contents of the current cell / cell range are displayed struck through.

SetWrap.name: SetWrap
SetWrap.description: Specifies whether the words in the cell must be wrapped to fit the cell size or not.

params.name: isWrap
params.description: Specifies if the words in the cell will be wrapped to fit the cell size.

GetWrapText.name: GetWrapText
GetWrapText.description: Returns the information about the wrapping cell style.

SetFillColor.name: SetFillColor
SetFillColor.description: Sets the background color to the current cell range with the previously created color object. Sets 'No Fill' when previously created color object is null.

params.name: oColor
params.description: The color object which specifies the color to be set to the background in the cell / cell range.

GetFillColor.name: GetFillColor
GetFillColor.description: Returns the background color for the current cell range. Returns 'No Fill' when the color of the background in the cell / cell range is null.

GetNumberFormat.name: GetNumberFormat
GetNumberFormat.description: Returns a value that represents the format code for the current range.

SetNumberFormat.name: SetNumberFormat
SetNumberFormat.description: Specifies whether a number in the cell should be treated like number, currency, date, time, etc. or just like text.

params.name: sFormat
params.description: Specifies the mask applied to the number in the cell.

SetBorders.name: SetBorders
SetBorders.description: Sets the border to the cell / cell range with the parameters specified.

params.name: bordersIndex
params.description: Specifies the cell border position.

params.name: lineStyle
params.description: Specifies the line style used to form the cell border.

params.name: oColor
params.description: The color object which specifies the color to be set to the cell border.

Merge.name: Merge
Merge.description: Merges the selected cell range into a single cell or a cell row.

params.name: isAcross
params.description: When set to true, the cells within the selected range will be merged along the rows, but remain split in the columns. When set to false, the whole selected range of cells will be merged into a single cell.

UnMerge.name: UnMerge
UnMerge.description: Splits the selected merged cell range into the single cells.

ForEach.name: ForEach
ForEach.description: Executes a provided function once for each cell.

params.name: fCallback
params.description: A function which will be executed for each cell.

AddComment.name: AddComment
AddComment.description: Adds a comment to the current range.

params.name: sText
params.description: The comment text.

params.name: sAuthor
params.description: The author's name (optional).

GetWorksheet.name: GetWorksheet
GetWorksheet.description: Returns the Worksheet object that represents the worksheet containing the specified range. It will be available in the read-only mode.

GetDefName.name: GetDefName
GetDefName.description: Returns the ApiName object of the current range.

GetComment.name: GetComment
GetComment.description: Returns the ApiComment object of the current range.

SetOrientation.name: SetOrientation
SetOrientation.description: Sets an angle to the current cell range.

params.name: angle
params.description: Specifies the range angle.

SetSort.name: SetSort
SetSort.description: Sorts the cells in the given range by the parameters specified in the request.

params.name: key1
params.description: First sort field.

params.name: sSortOrder1
params.description: The sort order for the values specified in Key1.

params.name: key2
params.description: Second sort field.

params.name: sSortOrder2
params.description: The sort order for the values specified in Key2.

params.name: key3
params.description: Third sort field.

params.name: sSortOrder3
params.description: The sort order for the values specified in Key3.

params.name: sHeader
params.description: Specifies whether the first row contains header information.

params.name: sOrientation
params.description: Specifies if the sort should be by row (default) or column.

params.name: shift
params.description: Specifies how to shift cells to replace the deleted cells ("up", "left").

Insert.name: Insert
Insert.description: Inserts a cell or a range of cells into the worksheet or macro sheet and shifts other cells away to make space.

params.name: shift
params.description: Specifies which way to shift the cells ("right", "down").

AutoFit.name: AutoFit
AutoFit.description: Changes the width of the columns or the height of the rows in the range to achieve the best fit.

params.name: bRows
params.description: Specifies if the width of the columns will be autofit.

params.name: bCols
params.description: Specifies if the height of the rows will be autofit.

Copy.name: Copy
Copy.description: Copies a range to the specified range.

params.name: destination
params.description: Specifies a new range to which the specified range will be copied.

Paste.name: Paste
Paste.description: Pastes the Range object to the specified range.

params.name: rangeFrom
params.description: Specifies the range to be pasted to the current range

Find.name: Find
Find.description: Finds specific information in the current range.

params.name: What
params.description: The data to search for.

params.name: After
params.description: The cell after which you want the search to begin. If this argument is not specified, the search starts after the cell in the upper-left corner of the range.

params.name: LookIn
params.description: Search data type (formulas or values).

params.name: LookAt
params.description: Specifies whether the whole search text or any part of the search text is matched.

params.name: SearchOrder
params.description: Range search order - by rows or by columns.

params.name: SearchDirection
params.description: Range search direction - next match or previous match.

params.name: MatchCase
params.description: Case sensitive or not. The default value is "false".

FindNext.name: FindNext
FindNext.description: Continues a search that was begun with the {@link ApiRange#Find} method. Finds the next cell that matches those same conditions and returns the ApiRange object that represents that cell. This does not affect the selection or the active cell.

params.name: After
params.description: The cell after which the search will start. If this argument is not specified, the search starts from the last cell found.

FindPrevious.name: FindPrevious
FindPrevious.description: Continues a search that was begun with the {@link ApiRange#Find} method. Finds the previous cell that matches those same conditions and returns the ApiRange object that represents that cell. This does not affect the selection or the active cell.

params.name: Before
params.description: The cell before which the search will start. If this argument is not specified, the search starts from the last cell found.

Replace.name: Replace
Replace.description: Replaces specific information to another one in a range.

params.name: What
params.description: The data to search for.

params.name: Replacement
params.description: The replacement string.

params.name: LookAt
params.description: Specifies whether the whole search text or any part of the search text is matched.

params.name: SearchOrder
params.description: Range search order - by rows or by columns.

params.name: SearchDirection
params.description: Range search direction - next match or previous match.

params.name: MatchCase
params.description: Case sensitive or not. The default value is "false".

params.name: ReplaceAll
params.description: Specifies if all the found data will be replaced or not. The default value is "true".

GetCharacters.name: GetCharacters
GetCharacters.description: Returns the ApiCharacters object that represents a range of characters within the object text. Use the ApiCharacters object to format characters within a text string.

params.name: Start
params.description: The first character to be returned. If this argument is either 1 or omitted, this property returns a range of characters starting with the first character.

params.name: Length
params.description: The number of characters to be returned. If this argument is omitted, this property returns the remainder of the string (everything after the Start character).

comment:
/**
	 * Class representing a range.
	 * @constructor
	 * @property {number} Row - Returns the row number for the selected cell.
	 * @property {number} Col - Returns the column number for the selected cell.
	 * @property {ApiRange} Rows - Returns the ApiRange object that represents the rows of the specified range.
	 * @property {ApiRange} Cols - Returns the ApiRange object that represents the columns of the specified range.
	 * @property {ApiRange} Cells - Returns a Range object that represents all the cells in the specified range or a specified cell.
	 * @property {number} Count - Returns the rows or columns count.
	 * @property {string} Address - Returns the range address.
	 * @property {string} Value - Returns a value from the first cell of the specified range or sets it to this cell.
	 * @property {string} Formula - Returns a formula from the first cell of the specified range or sets it to this cell.
	 * @property {string} Value2 - Returns the value2 (value without format) from the first cell of the specified range or sets it to this cell.
	 * @property {string} Text - Returns the text from the first cell of the specified range or sets it to this cell.
	 * @property {ApiColor} FontColor - Sets the text color to the current cell range with the previously created color object.
	 * @property {boolean} Hidden - Returns or sets the value hiding property.
	 * @property {number} ColumnWidth - Returns or sets the width of all the columns in the specified range measured in points.
	 * @property {number} Width - Returns a value that represents the range width measured in points.
	 * @property {number} RowHeight - Returns or sets the height of the first row in the specified range measured in points.
	 * @property {number} Height - Returns a value that represents the range height measured in points.
	 * @property {number} FontSize - Sets the font size to the characters of the current cell range.
	 * @property {string} FontName - Sets the specified font family as the font name for the current cell range.
	 * @property {'center' | 'bottom' | 'top' | 'distributed' | 'justify'} AlignVertical - Sets the text vertical alignment to the current cell range.
	 * @property {'left' | 'right' | 'center' | 'justify'} AlignHorizontal - Sets the text horizontal alignment to the current cell range.
	 * @property {boolean} Bold - Sets the bold property to the text characters from the current cell or cell range.
	 * @property {boolean} Italic - Sets the italic property to the text characters in the current cell or cell range.
	 * @property {'none' | 'single' | 'singleAccounting' | 'double' | 'doubleAccounting'} Underline - Sets the type of underline applied to the font.
	 * @property {boolean} Strikeout - Sets a value that indicates whether the contents of the current cell or cell range are displayed struck through.
	 * @property {boolean} WrapText - Returns the information about the wrapping cell style or specifies whether the words in the cell must be wrapped to fit the cell size or not.
	 * @property {ApiColor|'No Fill'} FillColor - Returns or sets the background color of the current cell range.
	 * @property {string} NumberFormat - Sets a value that represents the format code for the object.
	 * @property {ApiRange} MergeArea - Returns the cell or cell range from the merge area.
	 * @property {ApiWorksheet} Worksheet - Returns the ApiWorksheet object that represents the worksheet containing the specified range.
	 * @property {ApiName} DefName - Returns the ApiName object.
	 * @property {ApiComment | null} Comments - Returns the ApiComment collection that represents all the comments from the specified worksheet.
	 * @property {'xlDownward' | 'xlHorizontal' | 'xlUpward' | 'xlVertical'} Orientation - Sets an angle to the current cell range.
	 * @property {ApiAreas} Areas - Returns a collection of the areas.
	 * @property {ApiCharacters} Characters - Returns the ApiCharacters object that represents a range of characters within the object text. Use the ApiCharacters object to format characters within a text string.
	 */

properties.name: Row
properties.description: Returns the row number for the selected cell.

properties.name: Col
properties.description: Returns the column number for the selected cell.

properties.name: Rows
properties.description: Returns the ApiRange object that represents the rows of the specified range.

properties.name: Cols
properties.description: Returns the ApiRange object that represents the columns of the specified range.

properties.name: Cells
properties.description: Returns a Range object that represents all the cells in the specified range or a specified cell.

properties.name: Count
properties.description: Returns the rows or columns count.

properties.name: Address
properties.description: Returns the range address.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: Returns a value from the first cell of the specified range or sets it to this cell.

properties.name: Formula
properties.description: Returns a formula from the first cell of the specified range or sets it to this cell.

properties.name: Value2
properties.description: Returns the value2 (value without format) from the first cell of the specified range or sets it to this cell.

properties.name: Text
properties.description: Returns the text from the first cell of the specified range or sets it to this cell.

properties.name: FontColor
properties.description: Sets the text color to the current cell range with the previously created color object.

properties.name: Hidden
properties.description: Returns or sets the value hiding property.

properties.name: ColumnWidth
properties.description: Returns or sets the width of all the columns in the specified range measured in points.

properties.name: Width
properties.description: Returns a value that represents the range width measured in points.

properties.name: RowHeight
properties.description: Returns or sets the height of the first row in the specified range measured in points.

properties.name: Height
properties.description: Returns a value that represents the range height measured in points.

properties.name: FontSize
properties.description: Sets the font size to the characters of the current cell range.

properties.name: FontName
properties.description: Sets the specified font family as the font name for the current cell range.

properties.name: AlignVertical
properties.description: Sets the text vertical alignment to the current cell range.

properties.name: AlignHorizontal
properties.description: Sets the text horizontal alignment to the current cell range.

properties.name: Bold
properties.description: Sets the bold property to the text characters from the current cell or cell range.

properties.name: Italic
properties.description: Sets the italic property to the text characters in the current cell or cell range.

properties.name: Underline
properties.description: Sets the type of underline applied to the font.

properties.name: Strikeout
properties.description: Sets a value that indicates whether the contents of the current cell or cell range are displayed struck through.

properties.name: WrapText
properties.description: Returns the information about the wrapping cell style or specifies whether the words in the cell must be wrapped to fit the cell size or not.

properties.name: FillColor
properties.description: Returns or sets the background color of the current cell range.

properties.name: NumberFormat
properties.description: Sets a value that represents the format code for the object.

properties.name: MergeArea
properties.description: Returns the cell or cell range from the merge area.

properties.name: Worksheet
properties.description: Returns the ApiWorksheet object that represents the worksheet containing the specified range.

properties.name: DefName
properties.description: Returns the ApiName object.

properties.name: Comments
properties.description: Returns the ApiComment collection that represents all the comments from the specified worksheet.

properties.name: Orientation
properties.description: Sets an angle to the current cell range.

properties.name: Areas
properties.description: Returns a collection of the areas.

properties.name: Characters
properties.description: Returns the ApiCharacters object that represents a range of characters within the object text. Use the ApiCharacters object to format characters within a text string.
